text: Orly Airport is a large airport in France. It is in the outskirts of Paris. In 2017, it handled 32,042,475 passengers.Aéroport de Paris - Orly The head of the airport is Régis Lacote.Régis Lacote nommé directeur de l’aéroport Paris- Orly ==References== Category:Airports in Paris Category:Airports in France
title: Orly Airport
